docs.snippet: Instructions on where to get a refund or replacement phone were posted in an obscure spot on the Samsung home page. They were not on social media sites....
docs.lead_paragraph: Instructions on where to get a refund or replacement phone were posted in an obscure spot on the Samsung home page. They were not on social media sites.
docs.abstract: Both carriers and customers of Samsung Electronics' faulty and abandoned Galaxy Note 7 smartphone are frustrated by company's passive response to phone's fire risks; Samsung has repeatedly stumbled over past month in its efforts to deal with problem.

headline.main: Samsung’s Response to Galaxy Note 7 Crisis Draws Criticism
headline.print_headline: Samsung’s Passive Response to Note 7’s Risks Frustrates Carriers and Customers
